```{r}
library(babynames)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- babynames

x2 <- x %>%
  filter(sex == "M") %>%
  filter(year >= 1956) %>% 
  mutate(ends_with_e = ifelse(str_detect(name, "e$"), TRUE, FALSE)) %>%
  group_by(year, ends_with_e) %>%
  summarize(prop_e = sum(prop), 
            sum_e = sum(n)) 

x3 <- x %>%
  filter(sex == "M") %>%
  filter(year >= 1956) %>% 
  mutate(ends_with_a = ifelse(str_detect(name, "a$"), TRUE, FALSE)) %>%
  group_by(year, ends_with_a) %>%
  summarize(prop_a = sum(prop), 
            sum_a = sum(n)) 

x4 <- x %>%
  filter(sex == "M") %>%
  filter(year >= 1956) %>% 
  mutate(ends_with_i = ifelse(str_detect(name, "e$"), TRUE, FALSE)) %>%
  group_by(year, ends_with_e) %>%
  summarize(prop_e = sum(prop), 
            sum_e = sum(n)) 
```
